specialRules.hint: This model and up to half of the units in your army may be deployed from Ambush, and they must be deployed within 3” of this model.
specialRules.name: Burrow
specialRules.label: Burrow
specialRules.description: This model and up to half of the units in your army may be deployed from Ambush, and they must be deployed within 3” of this model.

specialRules.hint: This model may shoot after using Rush actions and doesn’t get -1 to hit for shooting indirect weapons after moving.
specialRules.name: Expert Thrower
specialRules.label: Expert Thrower
specialRules.description: This model may shoot after using Rush actions and doesn’t get -1 to hit for shooting indirect weapons after moving.

specialRules.hint: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).
specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.label: Takedown
specialRules.description: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).

specialRules.hint: Enemy units fighting this unit in melee get -1 to their attack rolls.
specialRules.name: Weighted Nets
specialRules.label: Weighted Nets
specialRules.description: Enemy units fighting this unit in melee get -1 to their attack rolls.

spells.name: Filth
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Poison in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Cracks
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Sickness
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Pestilence
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
